search.description: Performs batched web searches: supply an array 'query'; the tool retrieves the top 10 results for each query in one call.

query.description: Array of query strings. Include multiple complementary search queries in a single call.

visit.description: Visit webpage(s) and return the summary of the content.

url.description: The URL(s) of the webpage(s) to visit. Can be a single URL or an array of URLs.

goal.description: The specific information goal for visiting webpage(s).
